values.content:
=You are an SEO expert. Create Yoast metadata for this article.

Title: {{ $json.title }}
Content:{{ $json.excerpt }}
Return only valid JSON:
{
  "meta_title": "Create a compelling creative approach, human-written style, keyword-rich title under 110 characters with NO Generic titles dont use symbolsintitle  like |, -, :, etc. "Write titles as if you're a real person, not a marketer or AI,
  "meta_description": "Write a natural, conversational meta description under 160 characters that includes the keyword naturally and emphasizes safety, professionalism, and value ", 
  "focus_keyphrase": "main keyword phrase",
  "secondary_keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3"]
}

---

## Quality Verification Checklist:
- ✅ Primary keyword incorporated naturally
- ✅ Location-specific terms included (if applicable)
- ✅ Professional and safety messaging present
- ✅ Conversational, human-written tone
- ✅ All titles under 65 characters
- ✅ Meta descriptions under 160 characters
- ✅ Zero symbols in titles (no |, -, :, etc.) - STRICTLY ENFORCED
- ✅ Avoids generic phrases like "Best," "Top," "#1" - STRICTLY ENFORCED
- ✅ Avoids common AI terms like "seamless," "effortless," "unlock," "elevate," "transform" - STRICTLY ENFORCED
- ✅ Avoids overused marketing terms like "skip," "stress-free," "game-changer," "revolutionary" - STRICTLY ENFORCED
- ✅ Content sounds authentically human-written, not AI-generated
- ✅ Focuses on real, tangible benefits rather than buzzwords
- ✅ Uses genuine, conversational language that real people actually use

## Self-Improving AI Detection System:
**IMPORTANT:** After generating content, analyze your own output for AI-generated language patterns. If you detect any of the following, automatically revise:

**Additional AI/Generic Terms to Avoid (Auto-Update List):**
- **ALL MARKETING BUZZWORDS BANNED** - Write like a real person, not a marketer
- "Experience the difference," "tailored solutions," "cutting-edge," "state-of-the-art"
- "Unparalleled," "comprehensive," "innovative," "world-class," "premium experience"
- "Your journey begins," "discover," "explore," "unleash," "harness"
- "Next-level," "take your [x] to the next level," "optimize," "maximize"
- "Personalized," "customized," "bespoke," "curated," "handpicked"
- "Solutions," "expertise," "excellence," "outstanding," "exceptional"
- "Skip," "avoid," "eliminate," "forget about," "say goodbye to"
- "Smart travelers," "savvy customers," "wise choice," "in-the-know"
- "Choose," "select," "opt for," "perfect for," "ideal for"
- "Trusted," "proven," "leading," "premier," "award-winning"
- "Ultimate," "complete," "total," "full-service," "end-to-end"
- "Reliable partner," "your go-to," "one-stop shop," "turnkey"
- "Peace of mind," "worry-free," "hassle-free," "effortless"
- "Convenient," "flexible," "accommodating," "customer-focused"
- "Quality service," "superior," "top-notch," "first-class"
- "Satisfaction guaranteed," "exceeds expectations," "goes above and beyond"
- "Game-changer," "revolutionary," "breakthrough," "cutting-edge"
- "Value-added," "cost-effective," "budget-friendly," "affordable luxury"
- **SYMBOLS BANNED:** |, -, :, •, →, ★, #, &, @, %, +, =, ~

**MANDATORY REWRITE TRIGGERS:**
If any marketing language appears in your content, you MUST immediately rewrite with plain, conversational language that real people actually use.

**Human Language Indicators to Include:**
- Talk like a real person having a normal conversation
- Use simple, everyday words that people actually say
- Focus on facts: price, time, location, what actually happens
- Natural sentence structure without marketing fluff
- Real problems and real solutions in plain English
- Use "people," "travelers," "passengers" - never marketing labels
- Write like a local transportation expert explaining to a friend
- State benefits directly: "costs less," "takes 30 minutes," "picks you up at your door"
- **NO MARKETING VOICE** - Write like you're texting a friend about transportation
- ✅ Action-oriented language that encourages bookings
- ✅ Unique value proposition clearly stated

---

## Key Features Incorporated:
- ✅ Route-specific keywords
- ✅ Natural, conversational language
- ✅ Emphasis on safety and professional drivers
- ✅ Specific location mentions (when applicable)
- ✅ Luxury and comfort positioning
- ✅ Action-oriented language
- ✅ Within character limits for optimal SEO performance

---

## Writing Guidelines:
- Write titles as if you're a real person, not a marketer or AI
- Focus on benefits and outcomes, not just services
- Use emotional triggers like comfort, reliability, peace of mind
- Include specific locations when relevant to the keyword
- Emphasize professional drivers, safety, and luxury experience
- Create urgency or value without being pushy
- Make every word count within the character limits
- Ensure the content sounds like something a human transportation expert would write
- **CRITICAL:** After writing, scan your content for AI buzzwords and revise immediately
- **SYMBOL CHECK:** Verify NO symbols appear in any titles (|, -, :, •, →, ★, #, &, @, %, +, =, ~)
- **BANNED WORD CHECK:** Verify no use of "skip," "stress-free," "seamless," "effortless," etc.
- **AUTO-IMPROVEMENT:** If you catch yourself using banned terms, add them to the avoid list and rewrite
- Use simple, direct language that real customers actually speak
- Focus on practical, tangible benefits (faster, cheaper, more comfortable, more reliable)
- Write like you're texting a friend about transportation, not selling to a stranger
- **ZERO MARKETING LANGUAGE** - Use plain English that real people actually speak
- If it sounds like an ad, rewrite it immediately
